item.description:
If you have been wondering what living in cohousing is all about, this is an opportunity to get to know folks who actually live it, make new friends, and get a tour of Jamaica Plain Cohousing.

We look forward to chatting over brunch. Afterwards, we will give you a tour of our Common House which includes the kid's room, living room, Great Room, kitchen, mailroom, offices, rumpus room, laundry, and guest suite.

If you can, please bring a little something to share. We look forward to getting to know you!

And by the way, if you haven't done so already, check out the cohousing.org website for information about the many communities in and around the US.
item.how_to_find_us: Please come directly to the Common House across the yard.
item.name: Brunch at JP Cohousing
